root.name: Super Robot Wars A
root.description: Featured SeriesA list of the anime series which are featured in the game.Series that premiered in the Super Robot Wars series in this game are marked with "(new)".Mobile Suit Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack Mobile Fighter G Gundam New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz Mazinger Z Great Mazinger UFO Robo Grendizer Getter Robo Getter Robo G Shin Getter Robo (manga version) Super Electromagnetic Robot Combattler V Super Electromagnetic Machine Voltes V Brave Leader Daimos Invincible Super Man Zambot 3 Invincible Steel Man Daitarn 3 Metal Armor Dragonar (new) Martian Successor Nadesico(new) Banpresto Originals (Original characters created for the game) New FeaturesShield HP. Instead of shields simply reducing damage against the robot, in Super Robot Wars A they actually have their own HP rating; this essentially adds extra (non-recoverable) health to each unit.
